message.mandatory_subscribe_text: To continue using the bot, you need to subscribe to our channels:
message.adminEnter:
Mandatory subscriptions

To check the subscription, the channel admin must add the @{subCheckerBot} bot to the admins of his channel!
message.enterManagerUsername: Enter the customer's username or forward any message from him
message.enterIsBot: What are we going to subscribe to?
message.enterTitle: Enter the text for the button
message.enterName: Enter the name of the mandatory subscription (visible only to the admin)
message.enterChannelId: Enter the channel/group ID or forward any message from the channel. Make sure that forwarding not reposting.
message.botNotAdmin: Make sure the bot is added to the channel administrators
